content: छृद् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (छर्दति, छर्दयति ते) To kindle. {vII.v} {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> (छृणत्ति, छृन्न) {@--1@} To play. {@--2@} To shine. {@--3@} To vomit. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (छर्दयति-ते) {@--1@} To pour out. {@--2@} To spit out, eject, vomit. {@--3@} To kindle, light.
